byName.name: Doodle Jump
byName.description: Tap to shoot, tilt to move horizontally. Avoid and shoot enemies, get powerups, and don't fall!

byName.name: Flappy Bird
byName.description: Tap to keep your bird in the air. Pass between the pipes without hitting them.

byName.name: Karnage
byName.description: A fun multiplayer shooting game. You are placed in an arena with a few other players. Kill and don't die. WASD+mouse controls.

byName.name: Paper IO
byName.description: Each player is a colored square. Take territory by venturing and returning, and destroy your enemies. Be sure that no one else hits your trail, though!

byName.name: Shuffle
byName.description: Shuffle is an original online strategy board game. Players move their pieces at the same time, trying to eliminate the others' pieces and be the last one left standing.

byName.name: Slither
byName.description: Each player is a worm. Guide your worm with the mouse or arrow keys to eat and grow. If you crash into another's body, you die.

byName.name: Wings
byName.description: Each player is a plane. Use the mouse to steer and shoot. Lots of upgrades. Shoot down other planes and stay alive to move up the leaderboard.

byName.name: ZBall 5
byName.description: You are a red ball on a zigzagging path. Collect meat chunks to increase score by tapping to glide left and right. Dont fall off the path.
